li_2023.notes: User adjudication provided as 0.6 mg/kg bolus + 0.4 mg/kg/h infusion during surgery. Interpreted as mcg-scale dex regimen for physiologic plausibility.

momeni_2021.notes: User adjudication duplicated for Momeni 2021. Interpreted as mcg-scale dex regimen.

xing_2021.notes: User adjudication provided as Xi/Xing 2021: 0.5 mg/kg bolus during surgery. Interpreted as 0.5 mcg/kg dex bolus.
